bibl.title: Town Quarters in Greek, Roman, Byzantine and Early Arab Egypt.
Papyrology and the History of Early Islamic Egypt

series.title: Islamic History and Civilization. Studies and Texts.

bibl.note: Overview of attestations of laÊrai and êmfoda in Greek papyri of the Ptolemaic, Roman and Byzantine periods (including lists, arranged by place). - Edition of P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 31535 recto. List of laÊrai + the beginnings of names (that is, toponyms), occasionally interspersed with the term §po€kion + the beginnings of names or with other elements. Arsinoe, late-seventh / early-eighth century A.D. The other side, more difficult to read (part of a name, administrative term), brings into the world of early Arab Egypt. <laurai, amphoda, epoikion>
